bug.author: idx-jsuther
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
[ x] Read/searched the docs [x ] Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Create task with one label. Add tag to image. Select tag in objects menu. Click anywhere on the image in the current frame
<denchmark-h:h3>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Git hash commit (git log -1): release 1.0.0 beta2 Docker version docker version (e.g. Docker 17.0.05): 19.03.8 Are you using Docker Swarm or Kubernetes? No Operating System and version (e.g. Linux, Windows, MacOS): Windows 10 Error message:
<denchmark-code>TypeError Cannot read property 'removeClass' of undefined
TypeError: Cannot read property 'removeClass' of undefined at Mu.deactivateShape (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1383432) at Mu.deactivate (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1383945) at Mu.activate (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1386524) at Mu.notify (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1376376) at Cc.notify (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1293598) at Cc.activate (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1296682) at Lu.activate (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1390992) at od.componentDidUpdate (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:72:1424967) at yl (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:43:100837) at t.unstable_runWithPriority (http://localhost:8080/cvat-ui.min.js:51:3465)
</denchmark-code>
-Logs: <denchmark-link:https://pastebin.com/gJm3ejaL>https://pastebin.com/gJm3ejaL</denchmark-link>

comments.comment:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/idx-jsuther>@idx-jsuther</denchmark-link>
Please update CVAT. The issue should be resolved. Probably duplicate of <denchmark-link:https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/cvat/issues/1540>#1540</denchmark-link>
Let us know if it is not true.
